Licensing Classes¶

LicenseEngine¶

class SurveyManager.utility.Licensing.LicenseEngine¶

Licensing Engine for validating and getting the information associated with product keys.

Public Static Functions

static bool CheckIfValid (string productKey)¶

Get a value indicating if the specified product key is valid for this product.

Param productKey

The product key to check.

Return

True if the product key is valid; False otherwise.

static LicenseInfo GetLicenseInfo (string productKey)¶

Get the License information associated with the specified product key.

Param productKey

The product key to get the information for.

Return

If the License information is in the correct format, returns the correct license info. If not, returns a LicenseInfo object representing an Unlicensed entity.

LicenseInfo¶

class SurveyManager.utility.Licensing.LicenseInfo¶

Represents the information associated with a product key. This class can also create an empty, unlicensed information object.

Properties

string CustomerName { get; set; }¶

The name of the customer whom this product is licensed to.

string CustomerEmail { get; set; }¶

The email of the customer.

string NumberOfUses { get; set; }¶

The number of uses left for this product key.

string SerialID { get; set; }¶

The id of the serial number.

DateTime PurchaseDate { get; set; }¶

The date this license was purchased/obtained.

DateTime ExpirationDate { get; set; }¶

The date this license expires.

LicenseType Type { get; set; }¶

The type of license this customer has.

bool IsEmpty { get; set; }¶

Get a value indicating if this license info is empty.

Public Static Functions

static LicenseInfo CreateUnlicensedInfo ()¶

Get a license information object that represents an unlicensed product.

Return

LicenseType¶

enum SurveyManager.utility.Licensing.LicenseType¶

Enum representing the various license types that are valid.

Values:

Trial¶

A trial license key.

FullLicense¶

A full license key.

Unlicensed¶

Unlicensed key.
